thread.title: Gogglebox's Chris Steed is engaged - but not to Stephen Webb
thread.title_full: Gogglebox's Chris Steed is engaged - but not to Stephen Webb

title: Gogglebox's Chris Steed is engaged - but not to Stephen Webb
text:
Gogglebox's Chris Steed is engaged - but not to Stephen Webb Gogglebox's Chris Steed is engaged - but not to Stephen Webb Share 
Gogglebox star Chris Steed has revealed he is now an engaged man. 
The Brighton hairdresser, who appears on the Channel 4 reality show with ex-boyfriend Stephen Webb, announced his engagement to Tony Butland on Twitter. @Tony_Butland asked me to marry him at the top of the Eiffel Tower, so I said yes! pic.twitter.com/1n1VMH9JFQ 
— Chris#Gogglebox (@ChrissySteed) September 29, 2015 It's official…………I can't sing Beyoncé anymore thanks to @Tony_Butland x pic.twitter.com/JK5dTcnBli 
— Chris#Gogglebox (@ChrissySteed) October 1, 2015 
It follows Eve Woerdenweber’s engagement news to fiance Josh Smith. Filming #gogglebox and trying not to stare at my beautiful ring from my beautiful fiancé & soul mate. #engaged pic.twitter.com/DIwCiqPnsw 
— Eve Woerdenweber (@GoggleboxEve) September 25, 2015 
Chris and Stephen were a couple when Gogglebox first aired, and have since continued to appear together as friends. Chris Steed and Stephen Webb (Matt Crossick/PA) 
Chris and Tony have been dating since 2014. Christmas Day has been great! With @Tony_Butland pic.twitter.com/jPgNBS1Kaf Share article 
— Chris#Gogglebox (@ChrissySteed) December 25, 2014 Promoted Stories
